headline.main: It Will Yield Moscow Itself, if Necessary, but Looks to Winter Campaign for Time to Organize Spring Counter-Attack

lead_paragraph: ANKARA, Turkey, July 1 -- While unconfirmed but disquieting reports of new German victories and accelerated pushes of the German war machine into Russia continued to circulate here today, proSoviet sources maintained at least outward calm and spoke of "the coming Winter campaign."
abstract: Ankara pro-USSR sources say Stalin and leaders plan to lure Germans into interior
